summary: Defines a hybrid RNNT/CTC speech‑recognition model class that integrates both loss functions, handles model configuration, training, validation, testing, and transcription, and supports dynamic decoding strategies and vocabulary updates.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, high‑accuracy ASR solution that can be customized and deployed for applications requiring robust speech‑to‑text conversion, such as voice assistants, transcription services, and real‑time communication tools.
